"Letter, frog, KoyHc"
Tuesday
January 26, 1954
Harry—
Dick called yesterday in Houston, He had some worry about how to handle the
thru npm at his meeting*—late yesterday—-I think I did give him some help—He will
write me at Cuba—1*11 be in Miami Beach, Hotel Monte Carlo-Sendy 31 for 6 days and
then home—where I will give you full report,
Dick told me he called Bill in Pittsburgh for ideas—he suggested that Bill was
meeting with a group of Labor Peopleo.
Called him this morning—as an old friend^Pittsburgh was not on list of cities
for me to contact. Glad I did anyhow—he has a meeting set for this PM—with IA and
AFTRA. Told him how to handle the problem. And lucky for our side I am meeting both
Heller (AFTRA) and V&lsh 'TA.) in Miami,
It will 3aelp to know that Pitteburgh is IA Town* no XBEW in here—so It will be
easier. Had a very fine session with Sener—And Day (SQF*)* Sener is by far ahead in
his contacts—lay©*! out his whole approach when he meets with them week of Feb, 1. He
has friendly relations with IA-NABET-IHEV. His problem will be when he has to formalize
his procedure—when he adds staff—and goes on for longer time,
He is completely satisfied that my formula,as explained to you, if I get it accepted,
will help him immediately to solve his future needs.
Day, has a good relationship with HAHET-IBEW—Both want to keep IA—out— (strange
as that may seem)* He agrees to formula—and it would solve his present and future needs*
I am getting staff breakdown for him,,
Houston was a real treat, lnspit© of all the vorrys. 1 got to watch my step* Texans
are sensitive ate*, etc*, and he isn’t one of us ete<, etc* That"s nonsense—he is—
alert and willing to take suggestions * And frankly after first half hour be said, "He will
be asking m for help—Rather then 71 so versa".
His ia not an employment problem* There are no Unions in Town except Musicians—And
I think I can help* Will talk to Petrillo next week. I urged that he stick closer to
HAEB, He did attend Oklahoma Meeting* Maybe you saw him in N* I., He said he was at
Speech Cyrasstion..
He is outspoken in his school. Democratic tendencies and respected by School
Administration for it. Between us, I will try to help him with Mayor, Roy Hofheinz, an^
old FM, Ass. Pres — Hope this will give you some idea of present set up*
Harry, this in confidence, John Schwarzwalder wants help from Ford—from Centre Set
Up, He needs some equipment* It’s amazing what he does with his little budget, I only
saw it on surface, I confess. He got the green light yesterday for a very good Kegro
Program-a tie-up with Hegro Univei-gity, He says every one is scared about his
But that he has not had any suggestion of what to do—or what not to do from that source.
He will be keeping in close touch with you.,
As Ever,
/s/ Hovik
copy made 1/28/54
